  • Cheap and widely available coronavirus drug proves to be life-saving, researchers say Link: https://www.ctvnews.ca/health/coronavirus/cheap-and-widely-available-coronavirus-drug-proves-to-be-life-saving-researchers-say-1.4986053

    Researchers in England say they have the first evidence that a drug can improve COVID-19 survival: A cheap, widely available steroid called dexamethasone reduced deaths by up to one third in severely ill hospitalized patients.
